column5: Just wondering if anyone is having any luck at the mouths of the tribs? Bronte / Credit  Any info would be appreciated.....info in PM form would be awesome!!!  Also looking for any river conditions if you can help out, would hate to drive 3hrs and find the water too dirty.....thanks guys!!!!
you can check the flow rate(s) of your river(s) from this site.  Real Time Hydrometric Data
